page_content:
**Relevant Ghanaian policies on the integration of mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning into primary, secondary and tertiary curricula**

- [National Climate Change Policy (NCCP)](https://www.climate-laws.org/geographies/ghana/policies/national-climate-change-policy-nccp#:~:text=The%20NCCP%27s%20emphasis%20is%20on,dedicated%20climate%20change%20research%20centre.) -  has been developed to provide a clear pathway to deal with emerging climate change-related challenges.

- [Climate Change Master Plan](https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwi-xozM89D6AhUH_7sIHSiKCaIQFnoECA0QAQ&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.weadapt.org%2Fsystem%2Ffiles_force%2F2017%2Fghana_national_climate_change_master_plan_2015_2020.pdf%3Fdownload%3D1&usg=AOvVaw13Fq8iJI6IK3tqjKohJc7f) - developed to deal with the sectoral implementation of climate actions.

- [National Climate change and Green Economy Learning Strategy](https://www.uncclearn.org/country-projects/ghana/) -  has also been developed to operationalise the capacity building component of the Master Plan.
